mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce large files to improve mobile load times and responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Minimize JavaScript and CSS files and consider lazy loading for images to improve speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more optimized meta descriptions and alt text for images to improve SEO performance.
bookingFlowTip: Consider adding more visible calls to action and simplifying the booking process to make it more intuitive.
tips: Improve page speed with caching techniques.
Consider adding an FAQ section to reduce customer support queries.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website provides information about the Fitzpatrick Grand Central hotel and allows users to book directly.
